outfit_data.top: A silk blouse in a deep mint green with a minimal, clean-cut silhouette. It features a subtle draping detail at the neckline and long, flowing sleeves that end in delicate cuffs.
outfit_data.bottom: Khaki linen trousers tailored to a straight leg with a slightly cropped length. The fabric has a soft drape and a natural crease for a polished look.
outfit_data.shoes: Black leather heeled pumps with a closed toe and a moderate heel height (around 3 inches). Choose a sleek pointed-toe design that elongates the legs.
outfit_data.extras: A woven straw clutch bag in a neutral taupe color.
